subject: Football
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and its players association said Friday that they had finished overhauling their substance abuse policy, less than a week after they updated similar policies for performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: The N.F.L. and its players association said Friday that they had finished overhauling their substance abuse policy, less than a week after they updated similar policies for performance-enhancing drugs.
